product_name: Bark Commander AST Prone Paddle Board - 14'
long_description: Are you looking for a great workout and have a love for the water? This sleek prone paddle board excels in all water conditions, whether you're paddling for a training session or a nuking downwinder.
short_description: Are you looking for a great workout and have a love for the water? This sleek prone paddle board excels in all water conditions, whether you're paddling for a training session or a nuking downwinder.
